titleStmt.title: David Dills et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG4419

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
Cynthiana Ky
Novr 4th 1863
To His Excellency
Govenor Thos E. Bramlette,

We the undersigned would most respectfully state that at the May Term of the Harrison Circuit Court an indictment was found by the Grand Jury of said Court against one Guy Bryant for selling liquor to a miner by the name of Alonzo Lyter, The proof shows conclusively that at the time the liquor was sold to said Lyter that his (Lyters) Guardian & Step Father was present & drank with him, thereby giving tacit consent to his drinking the Spirits, but the Jury under the Law, & instructions of the Court were found to find said Bryant guilty of the charge in the indictment & fined him fifty Dollar, the least amount fixed by the Statute, & the Jury whose names are hereto signed together with other citizens who Know the circumstances & were present at the trial, would hereby most respectfully recommend Mr Bryant to the clemency of the Executive.
over

David Dills Foreman
Wm Hutcheron
J B Hickman
J H Debrulan
F. Cummins
C. G. Land
R J Levi
R S Holmes
george dumis
Wm Hinkson
B, F. Dills
Wm G Courtney
Jury on this case

J, B, McClintock SHC
T. J. Terry
T. W. Hedges
Alonzo Lyter
M. L. Broadwell P,J,H,C
I certify that the statement of the in the within petition is Substantially correct
G, W, Berry Capt & Pro Mar 6 -- /Destrict Ky

Harrison Cir Ct
vs
Guy Bryant
Tipling
$50
Remitted
10th Nov/63
